description: Numbers whose set of base 7 digits is {1,4}.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(1)=1, a(2)=4; a(n) = 7*a(floor(n/2))+1 for n odd, otherwise a(n) = 7*a(floor((n-1)/2))+4. [_Bruno Berselli_, May 28 2012]
